channel.title: Need php help
channel.description:
Is there anyone out here willing to help me with php over skype? I need to make a comparison site between MC donalds and Burger king products.
So basically I got like a ton of products, I give them values for price and the amount of calories and people can select what products they choose and when you click the calculate button it calculates the price difference etc...
I just need a push in my back for how to store the data, I understand how comparison operators and such work

item.title: Need php help
item.dc:creator: @Bauzz Bauzz
item.description:
@Bauzz wrote:

Store the data in some sort of database. Seeing as you’re using PHP then MySql is probably your best bet.

Read full topic
